articles.title: Google’s Pixel 10 phones raises the ante on artificial intelligence
articles.summary: Google on Wednesday unveiled a new line-up of Pixel smartphones injected with another dose of artificial intelligence that's designed to do everything from fetch vital information stored on the devices to help improve photos as they're being taken.
articles.translated_title: Google’s Pixel 10 phones raises the ante on artificial intelligence
articles.translated_summary: Google on Wednesday unveiled a new line-up of Pixel smartphones injected with another dose of artificial intelligence that's designed to do everything from fetch vital information stored on the devices to help improve photos as they're being taken.

articles.title: Opinion | A.I. Might Change the World Without Remaking It
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence may change the world, but it probably won’t remake it.

articles.title: NASA employs AI to better predict solar activity
articles.summary: NASA announced Wednesday that it is deciphering the sun's behavior with help from artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Google's Pixel 10 Phones Raise the Ante on Artificial Intelligence
articles.summary: A new lineup of Google's Pixel smartphones is here and they come with a big dose of AI.

articles.title: OpenAI CFO Sees Firm Selling AI Infrastructure Service in Future
articles.summary: OpenAI is considering eventually helping other businesses tap into the data centers and physical infrastructure needed for artificial intelligence, potentially creating a new revenue line that could offset some of the ChatGPT maker’s immense costs.

articles.title: Warren Brodey, 101, Dies; a Visionary at the Dawn of the Information Age
articles.summary: His work on complex systems and responsive technologies helped lay the groundwork for later work on artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Warren Brodey, 101, Dies; a Visionary at the Dawn of the Information Age

articles.title: AI is changing how people travel
articles.summary: Travelers are using artificial intelligence to plan their trips. An expert says this shift is more than a trend. It’s the new normal.
